list_definition.definition: the sounds from the mouth made in speaking or singing

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He has a very deep voice

list_definition.definition: the voice regarded as the means of expressing opinion

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The voice of the people should not be ignored

list_definition.definition: to produce the sound of (especially a consonant) with a vibration of the vocal cords as well as with the breath

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: ‘Th’ should be voiced in ‘this’ but not in ‘think’.
